mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID as boardId , MEMBER_ID as memberId, MNAME, WRITE_DATE as writeDate, MODIFY_DATE as modifyDate, TITLE, CONTENT, EVALUATION, CATEGORY_ID as categoryId, HIT as hit FROM BOARD d,MEMBERS m WHERE d.MEMBER_ID=m.mno and d.BOARD_ID=#{dno}

SELECT CATEGORY_ID as categoryId, CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName FROM BOARD_CATEGORY
WHERE CATEGORY_ID=#{category_id}
SELECT m.MNAME as memberName, c.COMMENT as comment, c.CRE_DATE as creDate FROM MEMBERS m, COMMENT c WHERE m.MNO=c.MEMBER_ID AND c.BOARD_ID=#{dno}
